cats.name: Tom
cats.notes: Enjoys chasing mice. Very bad at it.

cats.name: Socks
cats.notes: Likes to lie in the sun.

cats.name: Mittens Fluffer
cats.owners: (Cats do not have owners. They have staff.) Ada and Antigone Wolfe
cats.notes: Proven narcissistic and sociopathic tendencies. In otherwords, a pretty normal cat.

cats.name: Mittens the second
cats.notes: Heir to the throne of the mittens dynasty

cats.name: Hobbes Calvin
cats.notes: Believes humans have entered into a social contract with cats to pamper and feed them. Fondness for tuna fish.
